3 to 15 alphanumeric characters Between 6 and 20 characters Password mismatch Enter a valid email address
Sign In Create Account
No account yet? Create one Already have an account? Sign In
Thanks for registering to be a drone operator! \n\n Please check your email for mail from us confirming your account. \n\n Click the provided link in the email to confirm your account to be able to sign in.
Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer
Account Sign Out
Client Add Client Operator first name
Inspections End Inspection Start Inspection Current Inspection Past Inspections
Client Manager
Current Inspection
Unable to connect to drone because bluetooth is not enabled Failed to connect to drone Trying to connect to drone …
Please keep your eyes on the drone as it performs the inspection. Location: (Lat,Lng) Velocity: inf m/s State: 0xf8 Armable: true/false
Data is being transferred to the phone … Data is being uploaded to the cloud …
Past Inspections It seems there are no inspections for this client.
Inspection
Cannot sign out until active inspection is terminated and post inspection data processing completes.
Are you sure you want to end the current inspection? There is no active inspection to end. An inspection is already in progress.
Past inspection data needs to be up to date before a new inspection can be started. 9
Connecting to drone … Connected to drone Drone connection lost, trying to reconnect …
Inspection Phase 1: Drone is navigating home Inspection Phase 2: Receiving data from drone Inspection Phase 3: uploading data to cloud
Fetching data from the cloud …
Okay Start Try Again Next Got it! No Yes
